temporary-permission-reasons.required: You must select one or more reasons
temporary-permission-reasons.maxlength: Explanation must be 15,000 characters or less
temporary-permission-reasons.regex: Explanation must not include the following special characters [ ] < > / |
temporary-permission-reasons.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/url into your answers

temporary-permission-details.regex: Explanation must not include the following special characters [ ] < > / |
temporary-permission-details.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/url into your answers
